name: Chris
text: Earch, will these labyrinths ever end ?!

name: Earch
text: One more effort, I can sense the exit is getting closer...

name: Neant
text: Your search is coming to an end, yet abandonment will soon be an option.

name: Neant
text: Which of these paths were you really looking for in this place ?

name: Earch
text: It's the home stretch ! Come on, Chris !

name: Chris
text: (Okay, now's not the time to lose hope, man, we're gonna make it !)

name: Chris
text: (But... What if it really was Robert... ?)
